document_name: 2008 DelCap AWP Signed MoFED BoFED UNDP.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ETH/00049782/2008 DelCap AWP Signed MoFED BoFED UNDP.pdf

outputs.output_descr: (a) Capacities of the local governments, CSOs and private sector developed to create enabling environment for the LED interventions at regional and selected locality levels in 4 big Regions (Level-1); and (b) Employment and self-employment opportunities enhanced for the youth, women and vulnerable groups, through investments and targeted economic interventions, for the promotion of pro-poor economic growth and sustainable livelihoods, in selected localities in 4 big Regions (Level-2). Moreover the four Emerging Regional states will be supported to build their institutional capcity for service delivery.

project_descr: Developing Local Capacity for the Achievement of the MDGs (DeLCap)
project_title: DELCAP(Developing Local Capacity for Achievment of MDGs)
